channel.title: How does another person host another persons server?
channel.description: I can't figure it out, so I am asking.

item.title: How does another person host another persons server?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnage_Sh0w Pwnage Sh0w
item.description:
@Pwnage_Sh0w wrote:

Rofl. Your all “part” right. To get someone else to run your server… Upload it to a site like www.plunder.com and let them download it. Then they have to download NO-IP duc and give them the details to your NO-IP account, the password and your email. then they can choose the domain’s to run your server. Then they can run, edit, do whatever. Hope this helps.

Read full topic
item.source: How does another person host another persons server?

item.title: How does another person host another persons server?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

my cousin used to link computers with my friend, but im not sure how to do it with server and the network garbage. the only way i would say to have someone else host it is to give them the files to run it. otherwise, like `Worx said, better off hosting it yourself.

item.title: How does another person host another persons server?
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

Alphaspida:

Impossible, unless he was on the same network, which I don’t think is very likely, because he’d have to live with you.

No lol… Other people have remote-hosts all the time. Better off hosting your own server tbh.

Read full topic

no, you just have to make ur server into a .rar file, then host it or just upload it to a website and he downloads it, then he extracts it and boom he has ur source and then he runs it…and he also has to make ur host on no-ip to logg in
